title: Lol crashes whole computer but only at home
body: When i try to play league on my laptop from home the game will cause my whole computer but will work fine when im playing at my friends house or my parents. what could cause the game to crash while only playing at my house

replies.body: If this is a bugsplat while the game is loading, then something with your pc might be failing to render the game.  It can be caused by driver or file issues, but go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It crashes after the game is loaded usually 1 to 5 seconds into the game and it crashes 100% of the time. I have had no problems and zero crashes when playing at other peoples houses

Thanks for the additional information.  I stand behind going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help resolve the issue you're having, which is likely caused by bad game files or driver issues.  Since these issues are local, they would remain exclusive to your PC which is why you can play find in other locations.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
i will take a look at the game crash guide when i return home i am not playing from my home internet

Something similar happened to me on sunday when I used the alpha client! I played like 3-4 games with the alpha client and then suddenly my whole PC froze mid game and I had to restart it. I've never had such a freeze and it only happened when I used the alpha client + no bluescreen.

I also have the 2 r3dlogs from that game but I dont know how to analyze them :D

I'm not familiar with the Alpha client so you may want to ask on [their ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work)boards.  If I were to take a guess, I'd say the freezing might be due to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) game bar which has been causing this issue for some players.  If you have Windows 10, I recommend checking that out.  Good luck!
Thanks for the response! Is the Xbox Gamebar activated even if I didn't use the app once? Whenever I open the Xbox app it tells me to log in but I dont have a Xbox nor do I need the app
Aye, it auto-enabled even for those who don't have an account which is one reason why so many players experienced this.  Hope that helps!
